meanings.definition: Exhausted from lack of sleep or rest.
meanings.sent1: The baby was overtired and couldn't stop crying.
meanings.sent2: She looked overtired after pulling an all-nighter to finish her project.
meanings.sent3: Even the coffee couldn't hide her overtired appearance.
meanings.sent4: His overtired mind struggled to focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent5: The overtired marathon runner collapsed at the finish line.

meanings.sent1: His overtired eyes drooped with exhaustion.
meanings.sent2: The overtired workers yawned during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The overtired cat lazily stretched out on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The overtired engine sputtered and stalled.
meanings.sent5: Her overtired voice cracked from speaking for hours on end.
